author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Cool but WHAT
review:
Opening;

The surfing Dragon is an interesting choice for a Lego set but not in a bad way .

The build-

 The build starting with the head has a 1×1 red cheese slope on the back for a spike , the eyes are the standard 1×1 prints and the teeth are just two 1×1 white studs . The body has two stubby little green arms , a big sloped stomach and some sloped legs . His wings and tail are also nice . The stand is a 2×6 white plate with a 2×2 jumper and clip connecting to his........... Surfboard .

In conclusion-

this is a very well built Dragon that looks good from every angle but why is a mythical creature surfing any way it's still a good set but that question will linger in my mind for eternity .
